values.description:
Got Blocked Drains in Brighton? Need an emergency plumber in Brighton?

Blocked Drains Brighton - DrainBoss will clear your blocked drain or fix your leaky tap, burst pipe, water tank, replace ball valves and unblock your toilet at a set price and no callout fee.

We are a local Brighton drain and plumbing company with fully qualified drain technicians and emergency plumbers. We are an independent company, not a franchise, which means we can offer better rates as we have no 3rd parties to pay.

Blocked drains Brighton - DrainBoss also provide CCTV Drain Surveys, gutter cleaning, drain repair and no dig drain lining repairs. We also do appliance installations, property maintenance and Saniflo repairs.

Blocked Drains Brighton - DrainBoss provide blocked drain clearance and emergency plumbers in Brighton, Burgess Hill, Crawley, Crowborough, Eastbourne, East Grinstead, Haywards Heath, Horsham, Lewes, Reigate, Tunbridge Wells, Worthing and all towns in between.

Our vans are standing by to help - please call 01273 921789 or 07772 535248.
values.name: Blocked Drains Brighton - DrainBoss

Brighton Dome Conference & Events
values.description:
Rich architectural features combined with stylish 1930s art deco detail and floodlit contemporary spaces make Brighton Dome an impressive setting for any conference or event. Originally built as the Prince Regent’s Royal riding house in 1805, and following a spectacular renovation in 2002, Brighton Dome combines the best of Brighton’s past, present and future establishing itself as one of the South Coast’s premier event venues.

Offering a choice of 5 venues catering for 20 – 1700 people and boasting both Grade I and II listed heritage, Brighton Dome is ideally situated amidst the Royal Pavilion Gardens within the heart of Brighton’s dynamic cultural quarter. Ensuring ease of access for guests, Brighton Dome is just a ten minute walk from Brighton Station and only 30 minutes by rail or road to Gatwick International Airport.
 
Fresh, locally sourced ingredients ensure the Brighton Dome can offer a variety of menus to suit your event, all of which are created with imagination and a simple elegance. 

Supported by the same dedicated event team behind the renowned annual Brighton Festival and equipped with cutting-edge AV technology, whatever you imagine your event to be, you can be confident that we can create it.

Contact the events team at events@brightondome.org or call us on 01273 261 524.

GUITAR LESSONS BRIGHTON FROM A BRIGHTON GUITAR TEACHER!


Have you ever wanted to play the guitar, either electric, acoustic or bass guitar? 

Have you been playing for a while but you feel you're not progressing & want to learn more? 

Do you want to learn music you want to play, your favourite songs by your favourite bands and artists? 

Learn to play in a fun, hands-on way, with me, Brendan!


*I teach guitar from a fully equipped guitar studio in Brighton and have been a guitar tutor for over 10 years so i know how to move your playing forward. 
*I play in several bands and my music has appeared on TV programs for C4, DVD soundtracks & i've played many gigs including festivals such as 'Glastonbury' & 'The O2 Wireless Festival.' 
* I am CRB checked by the police & teach in schools in the Sussex area through West Sussex County Council- learn in a safe and relaxed atmosphere. 
* From beginner to advanced, all ages welcome! 

Lessons are taught at:
Sparker Studios, 29 Tidy Street, Brighton, East Sussex. 
(2 Mins from the train station & several car parks in the heart of Brighton's North Laine area) 
**!!We also teach drums, violin, piano & keyboard!!** 

My work hours are flexible, so please call or e-mail me today to discuss your needs and to find out the rates. 

email: brendanfurniss@yahoo.co.uk
mob: 07789 195715
Sparker Studios: 01273 818184
values.name: www.guitar-teacher-brighton.co.uk/
Brighton Fashion Week
values.description:
Brighton has always been a creative hub, attracting the likes of Julien McDonald who studied Fashion Textiles at Brighton University and Barbara Hulanicki, fashion designer and founder of Biba. 

Brighton Fashion Week was born out of a desire to promote the city’s eclectic fashion industry and celebrate the diversity of talent. Its longterm aim is to establish Brighton as a recognised style centre with its own annual Fashion Week. 

The first Brighton Frocks show took place in 2005, a free catwalk show featuring the work of 12 designers. Last year saw the arrival of the first weekend-long event, with the Brighton Frocks Fashion Show selling out in hours.

This year we bacame Brighton Fashion Week! The event spanning 5 days included the world famous Trashion Show, a Couture Show, a Ready to Wear Show and clothing exhibition and market!

The event has won many plaudits, being named ‘Event of the Week’ by Grazia, as well as featuring on Channel 4’s Gok Wan’s Fashion Fix and BBC 2's Scene Stealers.

values.name: Restaurants Brighton
values.description:
Restaurants Brighton is a comprehensive online eating out guide featuring Brighton and Hove restaurants and the nearby Sussex restaurants which serve Brighton. 

Including top quality and diverse restaurants - Brighton and the surrounding areas definitely takes the lead as a food destination. 

Restaurants Brighton is a food guide drawn together by people that live in Brighton, providing information for locals and tourists for Brighton and its neighbouring areas. 

Featuring top ten restaurants, brunches, reviews, chef interviews and restaurant features. 

http://restaurantsbrighton.co.uk

eat@restaurantsbrighton.co.uk

Brighton College International Schools Limited was established in 2009 as a subsidiary of Brighton College to plan and set up British-style international schools around the world under licence to Brighton College.  Each international school is privately and independently owned, and is operated by our investor partners.  They are managed by boards of governors, which include representatives of the school's owners.
 
Brighton College International Schools recruits the Head and the teaching staff, and encourages all schools operating under the Brighton College umbrella to seek ways to bring mutual educational benefit from their relationship through pupil and staff exchanges, sports and music tours and in-service training.
 
Brighton College Abu Dhabi opened in 2011. Our second sister school, Brighton College Al Ain, will open in the city of Al Ain in the Emirate of Abu Dhabi in September 2013.
values.name: Brighton College International Schools Ltd.
Brighton Collectibles
values.description:
Our Story

Jerry Kohl and Terri Kravitz (now Terri Kohl) – met, fell in love and started a specialty store east of Los Angeles while still in high school. They opened after classes, selling T-shirts and leather goods to their classmates. Upon graduating in 1969, they operated the store full-time.

They faced the challenge of getting merchandise delivered on time. Jerry had ideas for improving things. Coincidentally, a couple named Lee and Ginny – vendors of theirs who made belts, handbags and sandals – wanted to phase out of their business. Two years later, they decided to sell their company and move to New Zealand. Jerry bought into their company, Leegin, and began supplying specialty stores with leather goods.

When Jerry took over Leegin, it was a men’s belt manufacturer. Jerry and Terri wanted it to be a different kind of business, built from the heart by knocking on doors and personally servicing stores. Products would be created by their own designers and produced in their own factories to assure beauty and exceptional quality.

The designs evolved. Brighton began in 1985 out of the heritage of well-tailored, finely crafted men’s belts. Since men’s stores often had ladies’ departments, Lady Brighton belts were launched in 1990. With the debut of Brighton handbags in 1993 stores were able to offer customers fine quality handbags.

Wallets, small leathers, timepieces, fragrances, jewelry, gifts and sunglasses followed. In 1998, the first Brighton-only store opened in the Dallas Galleria... and became a runaway success! In 1995, footwear was added– making Brighton the only product line to accessorize women from head to toe!

Today there are over 160 Brighton Collectibles stores. Jerry and Terri are committed to empowering families through supporting a variety of charities.

values.name: Brighton Holistics
values.description:
Brighton Massage - Brighton Holistics

Looking for somewhere to go for a massage in the area of Brighton, Worthing or Eastbourne? 

Brighton Holistics is a leading centre for massage and massage courses. Offering variety in our treatments and relaxation methods, from sports massages to facials, we will have something for you!

If  you are looking to relax and indulge,  you may also want to consider a Swedish Massage, Body Wrap or  Aromatherapy in the comfort of our Brighton base.

In addition to our massages, we also offer a full range of Reiki Treatments and Reiki Courses.

So, next time you need a massage, gift ideas, or just some peace from the troubles in life, make sure you contact us here at Brighton Holistics.

Brighton Holistics: your first choice for massages and Reiki Courses in Brighton, Worthing and Eastbourne.

Brighton & Hove City Council  is a unitary authority and city on the south coast of England. It is England's most vibrant and cultural seaside city.

It was formed as a unitary authority area on 1 April 1997 by the merger of the East Sussex districts of Brighton and Hove. It immediately applied for and was granted borough status. In 2000 it was awarded city status together with two other UK towns, to mark the Millennium. 

Brighton and Hove is not part of the non-metropolitan county of East Sussex, but it is still part of the ceremonial county of East Sussex.
values.name: Brighton & Hove City Council

values.description:
SEE Brighton provides premium English language-learning services for Spanish-speaking visitors to this unique city on the south coast of England. Our service is tailored for adults so you can increase your confidence in English in a relaxed, non-classroom environment.

We believe learning English is more enjoyable when you can practice with others who share your interests, especially native speakers. We use our extensive local knowledge to provide a genuine ‘insider experience’. With access to the city’s wide range of cultural and social events, you can SEE Brighton while improving your English at the same time!

[En castellano]
SEE Brighton provee servicios de calidad para hispano-hablantes que quieren aprender inglés en esta ciudad única en la costa del sur de Inglaterra. Hemos diseñado nuestro servicio para adultos con el fin de que todos puedan aumentar su confianza con el inglés en un entorno relajado y social, y no solamente académico. 

Creemos que aprender inglés es más divertido cuando puedes practicar con otros que comparten tus intereses, especialmente con los nativos. Aprovechamos nuestro amplio conocimiento de la zona para proveer una experiencia auténtica. Al mismo tiempo que mejoras tu inglés puedes SEE Brighton y acceder a una gran diversidad de eventos culturales y sociales.
values.name: Spanish English Exchange Brighton (SEE Brighton)
XYZ Magazine
values.description:
XYZ Magazine, Brighton's FREE monthly guide to what’s on! 

We find the best club nights, gigs, shows, comedy, theatre, shopping & more, publishing it in a colourful glossy magazine. We're proud to have been guiding thousands of Brighton visitors, residents & students through the hustle and bustle of the busy Brighton entertainment scene every month for over six years.

- Est readership 100k pcm
- Distribution 600+ Stockists.  
- Age range 35+ 30% |25-34 35% |18-24 32% |13-17 3% 
- Gender split = Female 45% Male 55% 
- Pick-up 98% 
- Website 100-300k Unique Visitors per month 
- Social Media Network 25k connections 
Info/reserve space at Sales@xyzmagazine.co.uk or visit xyzmagazine.co.uk

Established in 2006, XYZ is a trusted guide to what's on,  and a trusted partner for businesses wishing to share appropriate offers and news with XYZ readers. 

We service institutions in Brighton for whom access to the best advertising platform is key, such as Brighton & Hove City Council, Brighton Institute of Modern Music and Brighton City College. We provide advertising for key brands with clout who need an experienced partner to provide the best in performance and value, such as Reading & Leeds Festivals, Fat Face Clothing or Jack Daniels Bourbon. We also ensure that local businesses enjoy access to the same service, with advertising available at a budget to allow access to thousands of local potential new customers in Brighton - one of the UK's most 'current' and cosmopolitan cities.

values.name: Brighton Creatives
values.description:
Creative Directors Emilie & Jen formed Brighton Creatives in 2012. They have a shared passion for the arts and the wonderful inhabitants of Brighton who have creative talent in abundance. With a mutual vision to uncover and promote these talents, Brighton Creatives was born.

Brighton Creatives produces up-to-date, design-led portfolios and promotional websites for filmmakers, musicians, fashion designers, photographers, artists, and craft workers, as well as other creative individuals. Brighton Creatives can also provide expertise with illustration, branding, logos and website re-design.

“We thrive on the creativity and ambition of our clients and the people we work alongside. A core ethos of Brighton Creatives is to continue to support our clients, both through our blog and our network of contacts.”

At the Brighton Economic Development Corporation, our vision is to enhance Brighton’s quality of life by fostering and supporting economic growth that will ensure Brighton as an ideal place to live, work, learn & play.  We provide the comprehensive data and resources that site selectors and business representatives need to do a comprehensive search of the Brighton area. 

The Brighton growth area is one of the fastest growing in the nation. We have a strong, well-educated workforce and a diverse industry that includes energy, healthcare, retail, hospitality, higher education, agriculture and manufacturing. We have lower taxes and sustainable growth – a winning combination for a new business owner, or a large manufacturer planning to relocate. 

But it’s no secret to site selectors that one of our greatest assets is location!  Brighton is just 15 minutes from the Denver International Airport and downtown Denver is a 20-minute drive away.
values.name: Brighton Economic Development Corporation

values.description:
A comprehensive, up-to-date and free on-line resource for parents living in and visiting Brighton, listing everything that is child friendly in Brighton. It includes what’s on for children in Brighton and Hove, things to do, events and activities for children, places to visit, attractions, and listings of groups, clubs and classes such as parent and baby groups, music groups, swimming lessons, ballet, dance and drama classes, arts and crafts classes. From indoor activities such as soft play centres, pottery painting and cinema, to outdoor activities such as farms, zoos, playgrounds and beaches, it provides an invaluable resource for parents looking for ideas for things to do with their children in Brighton and Hove. 

The website also provides listings of child friendly restaurants, cafes, pubs and hotels with details on facilities for children. The website is free to use, and free to be listed on. It is updated on a daily basis.

values: Activities and events for families and children in Brighton and Hove
Child friendly restaurants, cafes and pubs in Brighton and Hove

values.name: Child Friendly Brighton and Hove

values.description:
The Brighton Board of Trade was established in 1945 to help the neighborhood business community of Brighton, specifically by:

Lowering the costs of doing business in Brighton,

Increasing individual member’s sales and profits, and

Promoting a community spirit that improves the overall quality of life of Brighton residents.

The Brighton Board of Trade also works in conjunction with the neighborhood schools, small businesses, and sports organizations to help with their financial needs. In addition, the Brighton Board of Trade annually awards scholarships, makes donations to local little league and other non-profit organizations to assist with their financial needs.

The Brighton Board of Trade is in place for the community to take advantage of for support and assistance. In existence for 58 years we feel that there are numerous ways for the BBOT to reach out to help all interested parties and those in need.
values.name: Brighton Board of Trade

values.description:
A free job listing board for Brighton and Hove in East Sussex, offering free recruitment advertising for employers and free local job alerts for job seekers. 

For people seeking jobs in Brighton and Hove, or the surrounding towns and villages in Sussex, the website offers a free account management area for keeping track of applications, uploading CVs for local employers to view, adding jobs as 'favourites' and organising job alert settings. 

For employers seeking to recruit candidates for positions based near Brighton and Hove, the website offers both free and low cost recruitment advertising solutions. In addition to being able to post jobs free of charge for 30 days, employers can upgrade from as little as £20. Upgrades offer greater exposure and response. 

Whether you're a job seeker or an employer, Jobs in Brighton and Hove has the tools and the options to help connect the right people to the right job.
values.name: Jobs in Brighton and Hove
Brighton Lewis, Inc.
values.description:
Thanks to Brighton Lewis, finding the most reputable Missouri private investigators just got a whole lot easier. Brighton Lewis offers the most experienced investigative assistance around. Whether you need to get to the bottom of suspected infidelity, settle a child custody dispute, explore alleged employee deception or feel the need for personal security, Brighton Lewis is here to help.

Brighton Lewis also offers DUI consulting and training seminars to attorneys, legal staff and law enforcement. NHTSA DUI Instructors conduct seminars ranging from introduction of DUI Detection and SFST up to instructor level courses several times a year.  Services are available nationwide.
